name: Creamy Baked Spaghetti
author: RAGÚ®
summary: Spaghetti, prepared pasta sauce, mozzarella and cream cheese make a quick and cheesy comfort-food dinner.
ingredients: 2 (24 ounce) jars RAGÚ® Old World Style® Traditional Sauce
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Heat the sauce in a saucepan over medium heat
Add the cream cheese and stir until melted
Pour pasta and sauce into an oven-safe baking dish and mix well
Remove from oven and top with mozzarella cheese
Bake until the sauce is thick and the cheese is melted, 10 to 15 minutes
